summary: Replace the default Xbox360 images with the Dualshock 3 ones.
descriptionHtml:
Xbox360 Controller to Dualshock 3
------------------------------------------------
Usefull for those who are playing with a PS3 controller such as Sixaxis or a Dualshock 3 and who are not familiar with the Xbox360\'s controller.
To play with your Dualshock 3 or Sixaxis, download MotionInJoy and install it, then plug your PS3 controller and do the following :

http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/9553/ds3.png

(Otherwise your controller won\'t be recognized by Skyrim)

-------------------------------------------------

29/11/11 Initial Release :

Features:
------------
- Switch the In Game buttons display from X360 to PS3.

Known Bugs :
-----------------

- Images in the menus stay as original ... I\'m investigating on this.
author: Azsde
